website_summaries.verdict: The best deal available from a top name in makeup brushes. You get enough brushes for numerous application needs at a value price.
pros: Brightly colored vegan brushes in a variety made for numerous needs
Shaped for precise results for all types of makeup
Set comes with a handy storage case
cons: Users love the soft feel of the brushes but wish the smaller ones were more stable
Some brush tops were misshapen upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Best Brushes Out There
customer_reviews.text: I adore these brushes! They pick up product so well & blend effortlessly. These are my favorite brushes ever, & they're vegan!
customer_reviews.author: Max Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. After two years still soft! But the construction is not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. I bought these cause I needed a set with a carrying case and they were good for the price compared to other ones. The brushes are soft and have lasted a while, but the wood is not the best, it cracked on the bottom and the paint started to chip. They are still useable though. Also, one of them came apart in the first couple of months. I glued it back together and it’s fine but you know not ideal. All in all, they are good brushes and after two years still in good enough shape and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Makeup bag smells horrible, but brushes are REAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started doing more thorough makeup, and hence why i wanted some nice brushes, so I cant tell if they are fake or not by the labels on the brushes, as one person said. On first examination, they seem very soft and real, but also have a very strong paint-like smell, but after reading other reviews on genuine Morphe brush sets, it is the smell of the plastic-y brush holder, not the brushes themselves. But thr smell is SO strong, it makes all the brushes smell like it, they need to air out to smell clean. Other than the smell, though, they seem fine, SUPER soft, and compared to reviews of real Morphe sets it seems pretty real.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE REAL MORPHE BRUSHES
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing brushes that are great for beginners. So soft and high quality. For those doubting the authenticity, the vegan set does not have numbers on it if you look it up online (I'm almost positive that all of the sets do not have numbers- just the individual brushes). However, they all have the Morphe "logo" on them. It comes with a cute case that is great for traveling as well! My only complaint would be the color- I wish they weren't as bright and that they would come out with this set in black (they do have another vegan set in black, but it is $50+). Great purchase overall!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Gf enjoyed the brushes, but they are about half the price on morphe website. Just a heads up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter in law was very happy. Great product with excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. My daughter in law was very happy. Great product with excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: KathrynS

customer_reviews.title: Nice brushes for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Love how the blush and powder brushes are so soft. Some of the smaller eye shadow one are too soft though.
customer_reviews.author: DCowboy21

customer_reviews.title: I never write a review but since I am SO happy with this purchase I had to write one
customer_reviews.text: They just arrived and earlier than expected. I never write a review but since I am SO happy with this purchase I had to write one. Amazing! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I will stick to Real Techniques. These brushes aren't dense. They don't shed and I like the color combo. That is about it!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest Makeup Brushes I've Ever Seen
customer_reviews.text: Adorable Vegan brushes at a great price. Not much more I could ask for
customer_reviews.author: Samii Rae

customer_reviews.title: Not worth its
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Brushes are falling apart and I don’t even use them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Morphe Brushes are worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are awesome. The bristles are smooth and application is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Ammo

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely durable and the brushes are so soft ...
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely durable and the brushes are so soft. It's a snatch for the price in which it is sold
customer_reviews.author: Vanshi B.

customer_reviews.title: As hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know whether it is good or not, but my wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: M7mdiab

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using them and learning how to apply my make ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of brushes, they were inexpensive and they are appealing to the eye. I enjoy using them and learning how to apply my make up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Morphe brushes
customer_reviews.text: Love Morphe brushes! Love mermaids too and this is totally the vibe I got from these. The brushes are high quality and I am incredibly pleased with Morphe as always.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picks up product amazingly and super soft I love these brushes so so much
customer_reviews.author: Kallee Mason

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality of brushes not as great as I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter as a surprise and they are the best brushes that she has seen
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter as a surprise and they are the best brushes that she has seen. The color was AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is awesome. Would recommend them 100%
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to give it to my daughter for her birthday. Quality is awesome. Would recommend them 100%
customer_reviews.author: T-Man

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice!! Idc if they are real or not they are worth the price!! They come in a leather looking case as well that looks really nice too! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Acra

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are so soft and beautiful! The brushes pick up product easily and everything comes out amazing! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: This brush set is Beautiful. The brushes are soft and also pretty. I am so happy with this set. The case is also lovely. I am totally jazzed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: The bristles are soft and are perfect for using on my clients with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely ADORE this set! The bristles are soft and are perfect for using on my clients with sensitive skin. I get so many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are amazing! They are so soft and apply my make up in an excellent way. Good quality, bristles do not come off.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Don't think they're real
customer_reviews.text: I think these are probably fakes. Quality is fine. Doesn't seem to pick up much product. Just okay I would say.
customer_reviews.author: LukesFather

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushes. They're super soft and so pretty! They aren't like the other more expensive brushes I have and not very dense, but they apply makeup very beautifully. I was surprised by how much I liked them. However, they also look so pretty sitting on my vanity, which is what I've wound up using them for. If you're looking for a pretty brush, get these- if you're looking for function, they're not my top pick, but they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: They're ok.
customer_reviews.text: I read that these brushes are made for applying liquid makeup, but honestly I don't see how anyone has had any success in using them. I'm used to Sephora brushes and these are super soft and it's hard to do anything. I still use them occasionally but only when I can't find my Sephora brushes. I was just really disappointed in this brush set.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for one granddaughter and it is really cute ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for one granddaughter and it is really cute. Another granddaughter saw it so now have to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Maierhofer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft! I love them and the case that ...
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! I love them and the case that they came in, which is a lot nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She loves it! Says that they are perfect and is already using them! Delivery was right on the date. Looked well handled in the packaging. Been using Amazon for about a month now and I am gaining confidence in product and delivery. Great gift! Look exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Despite few minor flaws, these brushes look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: They're beautiful! The packaging is terrible though. The two bigger brushes come with clear protective sleeves and one brush is misshapen from being squished into the sleeve. That same brush actually broke apart the moment I removed it from the sleeve 😑 Aside from the biggest brush being horrible, the rest of the set feels great. The bristles are super plush but are dense enough that I think they'll do just lovely with application.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushes. Super soft and great quality. Morphe is printed on every brush. Was very surprise in the quality of the case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Soft easy to use brushes. Great variety and range of brush types
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter, she LOVED it!! She says the brushes are very soft and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Mama de 3

customer_reviews.title: Love the individual slots for each brush
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and well made. Love the individual slots for each brush.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Reck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this set i have nothing bad to say about it and i LOVE that it's vegan!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are so soft and blend beautifully. And the travel case is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Aristondo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but they do feel a little cheap. Some of mine have come unglued. Love the case and the softness of the brushes though!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Couch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brush set are so cute my favorite. I really recommend 💙
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again or as a gift. Great starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Great brush set! Originally purchased to give the Morphe brand a try and help fill out my brush collection. The colors are vivid and have held up well during cleanings. The brushes are moderately soft and full. As my brush needs grow, Morphe will be a brand I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin King

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brush set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful brush set, great price, soft, good quality, and easy to take on the go. My favorite set so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kris-10

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure these are Morphe...
customer_reviews.text: Just received and from what I can see the brushes are really soft and looks like the photos!! But .. I don't believe this are True Morphe brushes there are no numbers on each brush which you would use to identity each brush. Update : These aren't Authentic Moephe brushes ! They started to fall apart and separate after first wash!
customer_reviews.author: Breluvly

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!! The softest brushes ever. And love the colors. These were a great price and super fast shipping. Can't go wrong with these. UPDATE 5/9/16 WOW these are great brushes I am amazed how soft they are. I love the way they feel and the way my makeup is applied. Great deal on these brushes!!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

product_meta.title: Morphe 10 Piece Vegan Makeup Brush Set (Set 680)
product_meta.description:
Morphe Brushes has become a powerhouse in makeup products be offering the quality you’d expect from famous brands but at an affordable price. Morphe Brushes only manufacturer makeup products that can exceed the quality of other brands and can offer it for a lot less and its reputation for quality quickly caught on. Now you can join the Morphe Brush revolution with a flawless finish with the Morphe 10 Piece Vegan Makeup Brush Set

Bdirect Online is excited to offer you this this exclusive and exciting Morphe Vegan Makeup Brush Set Set consisting of:

 * Oval Lip Brush - 5 3/4"
 * Pointed Liner Brush - 5 3/4"
 * Angle Liner Brush - 5 3/4"
 * Concealer Brush - 5 3/4"
 * Oval Fluff Brush - 6 1/2"
 * Chisel Fluff Brush - 5 1/2"
 * Deluxe Eyeshadow Brush - 6 1/2"
 * Flat Oval Foundation Brush - 7"
 * Tapered Blush Brush - 7"
 * Tapered Powder Brush - 7 1/2"
 * Snap Case - 10 slot faux case for brushes that snaps shut.

Apply your makeup with perfection using the Morphe 10 Piece Vegan Brush Set; these professional quality brushes are 100% vegan and a fraction of the price of professional name brands. Great for liquid, cream, or powder application, achieve flawless and precise coverage with the soft yet firm bristles of the Morphe make-up brushes. You will never want to use another brand! Our brushes are an essential for the professional makeup artist, as they are premium quality and their affordable price allows you to acquire the complete assortment. Morphe only uses the highest quality materials in making our makeup & brushes; the preferred and best source for passionate makeup users.
feature_bullets: AFFORDABLE LUXURY: Morphe brushes are a vital staple for everybody, whether they’re a makeup beginner or a professional makeup artist, as they are superior in quality and their affordable price allows you to maintain a complete assortment.
VALUE SET: Morphe 10 Piece Vegan Makeup Brush Set features 10 vegan beautifully styled and expertly crafted brushes with luxuriously plush bristles packaged in sleek snap case.

MULTIPURPOSE BRUSHES: The master make up brush set has a variety of brushes for almost any type of makeup and applications, such as creams, powders, foundation, concealers and liquids. Set contains all the brushes you need to meet all your makeup needs.
PERFECT PRECISION: Achieve flawless and precise coverage with the soft yet firm bristles of the Morphe makeup brushes that are ideal for sensitive skin; you will never want to use another brand!
PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: Morphe only uses the highest quality materials in making our makeup & brushes; the preferred and best source for passionate makeup users
